description: Smart, attractive, athletic, and talented like Yukino, Soichiro Arima becomes Yukino`s rival at school. Very handsome and popular, Soichiro excels at kendo and becomes a national champion. He is at first smitten by Yukino, unaware that she secretly hated him and constantly tried to compete with him. After unwittingly discovering that Yukino is not the model student everyone thinks she is, Soichiro blackmails her into doing his school work so he can spend more time with her. After resolving the issue and becoming each other`s first true friend, they eventually fall in love.
name: Arima Souichirou
